India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [251] [252] [253] [254] [255] [256]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [272]

India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for all of Arunachal Pradesh , Manipur , Mizoram and parts of Himachal Pradesh , Jammu and Kashmir and Uttarakhand . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and Lakshadweep and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. Azerbaijan | Azerbaijan : Azerbaijan refuses entry to citizens of the Republic of Cyprus with Armenian descent. This restriction applies to all countries. [315] It also strictly refuses entry to foreigners in general whose passport shows evidence of entry into the self-proclaimed Nagorno-Karabakh Republic , declaring them a so-called personae non gratae . Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [239]
Sudan | Sudan 鈥?All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [244]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [245] [246] [247] [248] [249] [250]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan 鈥?Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [251]
Palestine | Palestine 鈥?Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [256] [257]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan 鈥?A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [262]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [241]
Sudan | Sudan 鈥?All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit. Darfur 鈥?Separate travel permit is required. [245]
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [248]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [249] [250] [251] [252] [253] [254]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan 鈥?Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [255]
Palestine | Palestine 鈥?Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [260] [261]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan 鈥?A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [266]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [237]
Sudan | Sudan 鈥?All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [242]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [243] [244] [245] [246] [247] [248]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan 鈥?Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [249]
Palestine | Palestine 鈥?Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [254] [255]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan 鈥?A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [260]
Yemen | Yemen 鈥?Special permission needed for travel outside Sana鈥檃 or Aden . [265]
Colombia | Colombia 鈥?Visitors arriving at San Andr茅s and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [276]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [227]
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [233]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for all of Arunachal Pradesh , Manipur , Mizoram and parts of Himachal Pradesh , Jammu and Kashmir and Uttarakhand . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and Lakshadweep and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [234] [235] [236] [237] [238]
Palestine | Palestine 鈥?Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [240]

Processing table 3 ...
Myanmar | Conditional Visa on Arrival for Business Visa, workshops and events etc. It's unclear if exemption is valid for tourist visas.Though, full reciprocity exits only in providing E-visa for tourism purpose.
Indonesia | Visa not required for tourism purpose. Visa on arrival for business and family visit.
Vietnam | Before travelling, an online approval letter needs to be received from a designated visa agency, and printed out. Takes 2 working days. Then, Visa on Arrival at Hanoi, Da Nang and HCM City.
Laos | Visa on arrival for 30 days
Cambodia | Visa on arrival for 30 days
Bolivia | Visa on arrival for 90 days, charged at La Paz airport. Prior visa is free of cost at Bolivian embassy.

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [233]
Sudan | Sudan 鈥?All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [238]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [239] [240] [241] [242] [243] [244]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan 鈥?Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [246]
Palestine | Palestine 鈥?Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [251] [252]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan 鈥?A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [257]
Yemen | Yemen 鈥?Special permission needed for travel outside Sana鈥檃 or Aden . [262]
Colombia | Colombia 鈥?Visitors arriving at San Andr茅s and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [272]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [239]

Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [248] [249] [250] [251] [252] [253]

India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [247] [248] [249] [250] [251] [252]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [302]
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [308]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for all of Arunachal Pradesh , Manipur , Mizoram and parts of Himachal Pradesh , Jammu and Kashmir and Uttarakhand . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and Lakshadweep and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [236]
Sudan | Sudan 鈥?All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [241]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [242] [243] [244] [245] [246] [247]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan 鈥?Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [248]
Palestine | Palestine 鈥?Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [253] [254]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan 鈥?A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [259]
Yemen | Yemen 鈥?Special permission needed for travel outside Sana鈥檃 or Aden . [264]
Colombia | Colombia 鈥?Visitors arriving at San Andr茅s and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [275]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [239]
Sudan | Sudan 鈥?All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [246]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [247] [248] [249] [250] [251] [252]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan 鈥?Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [253]
Palestine | Palestine 鈥?Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [258] [259]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan 鈥?A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [264]

Azerbaijan | Azerbaijan : As a result of the Nagorno-Karabakh War between Azerbaijan and Armenia , Azerbaijan refuses entry to passport-holders of the Russian Federation and any other country of Armenian descent. [347] It also strictly refuses entry to foreigners in general whose passport shows evidence of entry into the self-proclaimed Nagorno-Karabakh Republic , declaring them a so-called personae non gratae . [348]

Bhutan | For a maximum stay of 15 days if the application was submitted at least 2 and a half months before arrival and if the clearance was obtained.
Cameroon | Must hold approval from the General Delegate of Security.
C么te d'Ivoire | Must hold an invitation letter from the state authorities.
Eritrea | Must have a sponsor who must submit an application at least 48 hours before arrival.
Gabon | Holders of entry authorisation issued by the state authorities.
Belarus | Visas are issued upon arrival at Minsk airport if the support documents were submitted at least 3 days prior to arrival
Liberia | Available only if arriving from a country without a diplomatic mission of Liberia and if a sponsor obtained an approval.
Nigeria | Holders of a visa application who have a Nigerian company taking responsibility for them.
Sierra Leone | Holders of a visa approval.
Sudan | Holders of an entry permit issued by the Ministry of Interior.
Turkmenistan | Holders of an invitation letter of the local company that was approved by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
Uzbekistan | Holders of a visa confirmation by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [246] [247] [248] [249] [250] [251]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [237]
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [245]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [246] [247] [248] [249] [250] [251]
Palestine | Palestine 鈥?Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [253]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan 鈥?A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [261]
Colombia | Colombia 鈥?Visitors arriving at San Andr茅s and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [268]

Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [223] [224] [225] [226] [227] [228]
